content:
Based on the execution logs and entity data, here is the updated report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Production Facility
Consists of three stone furnaces in a row:
- Furnace 1 at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 2 at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 3 at position (4.0, 4.0)
All furnaces are used for smelting copper ore into copper plates

### Copper Cable Manufacturing Line
Located around position (9.5, 11.5), consists of:
- Assembling machine producing copper cables
- Input burner inserter at (7.5, 11.5) connected to input chest
- Output burner inserter at (11.5, 11.5) connected to output chest
- Input wooden chest at (6.5, 11.5) containing iron plates
- Output wooden chest at (12.5, 11.5) containing mixed materials

### Storage Area
Series of wooden chests at:
- Position (14.5, 11.5) storing iron plates
- Position (16.5, 11.5) storing copper plates

### Power Generation System
Located around position (-7.0, 24.5), consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Boiler at (-7.0, 24.5)
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 24.5)
- Connected pipe network carrying water and steam
- Small electric poles distributing power

### Science Lab Setup
Located around position (0.5, 28.5), consists of:
- Lab for research
- Burner inserter at (0.5, 30.5)
- Supply chest at (0.5, 31.5) containing science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Research-related errors
- Cannot research already completed technologies (Automation, Logistics)
- Cannot research technologies without completing prerequisites first (Logistics 2 requires Logistics)

### Resource insertion errors
- Verify inventory has required items before attempting insertion (coal, copper ore)
- Check if target entity can accept more items before inserting

### Assembly machine extraction errors
- Ensure products are ready in assembling machine before attempting extraction
- Wait for production cycle to complete before extracting items

### Output blocking errors
- Ensure there is space in destination entities before transferring items
- Clear blocked items from ground when detected
